title: White Rock Beach Club Ungasan (Half-day)
overview: Enjoy the dramatic cliffs, infinity pool, and ocean views at White Rock Beach Club in Ungasan.

stops.description: Depart for White Rock Beach Club Ungasan.
Arrive and enjoy the infinity pool and cliffside views.
Sip cocktails and enjoy the sunset from the cliffs.

title: White Rock Beach Club Ungasan Experience (Full-day)
overview: A full day of relaxation, food, and sunsets at White Rock Beach Club in Ungasan.

stops.description: Depart for White Rock Beach Club Ungasan.
Arrive and enjoy the infinity pool, food, and club facilities.

stops.location: Lunch at White Rock Beach Club
stops.description: Lunch with ocean and cliff views.
Relax by the pool, enjoy club amenities, or stroll the cliffs.
